name: DeleteTimeTrackingEntry
description:
Delete a specific time tracking entry in Asana.

Use this tool to delete an existing time tracking entry by specifying its unique identifier in Asana. Useful for managing and correcting time tracking data.

parameters.name: time_tracking_entry_identifier
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the time tracking entry to be deleted.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the time tracking entry.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Set to true for a formatted, readable JSON response. Use for debugging; increases response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: opt_pretty
parameters.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

parameters.name: time_tracking_entry_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the time tracking entry.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the time tracking entry.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
